lib/hope/concurrency/sutter_queue.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <atomic>
00012 
00013 namespace hope::concurrency {
00014 
00015     template <typename T>
00016     class sutter_queue final {
00017 
00018         struct node final {
00019             template<typename TVal>
00020             explicit node(TVal&& val)
00021                 : value(std::forward<TVal>(val)), next(nullptr) { }
00022 
00023             T value;
00024 
00025             node* next{ nullptr };
00026         };
00027     
00028     public:
00029 
00030         // This queue must be fully constructed before being used in another thread.
00031         sutter_queue() {
00032             m_first = m_divider = m_last = new node(T());
00033         }
00034     
00035         ~sutter_queue() {
00036             while (m_first != nullptr) {
00037                 node* temp = m_first;
00038                 m_first = temp->next;
00039                 delete temp;
00040             }
00041         }
00042     
00043         template<typename TVal>
00044         void enqueue(TVal&& item) {
00045             auto* last = m_last.load();
00046             last->next = new node(std::forward<TVal>(item));
00047     
00048             produce_impl(last);
00049         }
00050     
00051         bool dequeue(T& item) {
00052             auto* divNode = m_divider.load();
00053             if (auto * lastNode = m_last.load(); divNode != lastNode)
00054             {
00055                 item = std::move(divNode->next->value);
00056                 divNode = divNode->next;
00057                 m_divider.store(divNode);
00058     
00059                 return true;
00060             }
00061             return false;
00062         }
00063     
00064     private:
00065         void produce_impl(node* tmpLast) {
00066             tmpLast = tmpLast->next;
00067     
00068             m_last.store(tmpLast);
00069     
00070             node* div = m_divider.load();
00071             while (m_first != div) {
00072                 node* temp = m_first;
00073                 m_first = m_first->next;
00074                 delete temp;
00075     
00076                 div = m_divider.load();
00077             }
00078         }
00079 
00080         constexpr static std::size_t CacheLineSize{ 64 };
00081 
00082         node* m_first;    // Producer Only
00083 
00084         uint8_t m_cache_padding1[CacheLineSize]{ };
00085 
00086         std::atomic<node*>     m_divider;    // Producer / Consumer
00087 
00088         uint8_t m_cache_padding2[CacheLineSize]{ };
00089 
00090         std::atomic<node*>     m_last;        // Producer / Consumer
00091     };
00092 }
